result.execSummary:
The defendant Alvin A. Wollin was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Firearm by Felon, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.29(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: 3:53 pm - 14CF12 & 14CM8 - Defendant Alvin A. Wollin appeared with attorney Christina Writz on behalf of David Deda.  Mark T Fuhr appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA states agreement.  Court questions DE regarding right to preliminary hearing and waiver form.  Court finds waiver is given freely and accepts and binds DE over for trial.  DA files information.  Parties have reviewed information and waives reading.  DE pleads NO CONTEST to 14CF12.    Court questions DE regarding the plea and plea questionnaire.  DA explains elements of charge.  Court finds plea/waiver to be free, etc.  Court finds factual basis does exist.  Court accepts plea, finds DE guilty and orders entry of JOC on 14CF12 and on motion of DA dismisses and reads in 14CM8.  Court imposes:  (14CF12) - $50 fine + costs ($341); $78.75 SBDA; Forfeiture of firearm.  Payplan of $50/month starting 06-02-14.  Appeal rights given.  Adj. 4:03 pm.
Plea and sentencing on 05-29-14 at 4:00 pm

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt:
If not already completed DE must submit to booking at Sheriff's Dept prior to release.
Defendant shall give written notice prior to any change in address or telephone number to the Clerk of this Court and Defense Attorney.  Defendant may not possess firearms

14CM8 & 14CF12 - Defendant Alvin A. Wollin appeared with attorney David B Deda.  Mark T Fuhr appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Complaint acknowledged, reading waived.  DE enters plea of NOT GUILTY to all counts on 14CM8.    Preliminary hearing requested, time limits waived on 12CF12.    Court orders Pre-trial conference be scheduled.  Add 14CM8 to bond in 14CF12.

If not already completed DE must submit to booking at Sheriff's Dept prior to release.  Defendant shall give written notice prior to any change in address or telephone number to the Clerk of this Court and Defense Attorney.  Defendant may not possess firearms.
